item.title: Warrior Openers
item.description: Warrior Openers and Rotation Warriors prepare their burst while waiting for the party buffs to appear. After the buffs are up, the skills are used more or less in order of importance, as to gain potential re-uses towards the end of the fight. Opener Optimization Assumed Timings: Tomahawk starts at -0.70s and the pull starts at 0.00s Party buffs are expected to be up at around 7.80s Skill Speed requirements
